survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their dining experience at plant-based restaurants, focusing on food quality, service, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.
